com.github.clownvin.jtwitchbot.connection

Class ServerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.github.clownvin.jtwitchbot.connection.ServerConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class ServerConnection
extends java.lang.Thread
    Author:
    Calvin This class is the true "main" object. Everything revolves around this object, and all input and output flows through an instance of this object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

      • messageThrottler

        private final java.lang.Thread messageThrottler
        This throttles the output of whisper messages, so that the bot doesn't get notifications about being too fast.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerConnection

        public ServerConnection(ServerInfo serverInfo,
                        TwitchBot bot)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor for a new instance of server connection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IOException is thrown while creating socket, output, or input, throw it to the caller since this object is basically useless then.

    • Method Detail

      • handleLine

        private void handleLine(java.lang.String line)
        First step in interpreting input from the input stream. Directs the message to where it needs to go based on its command.
        Parameters:
        line - line of input to process.

      • logIn

        private void logIn()
        Basically just logs into the server using the bot's login info.

      • run

        public void run()
        Overridden run method. Each step of the while-loop, a single line is read from the input stream, and handleLine is called.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • sendCommand

        public boolean sendCommand(java.lang.String command,
                           java.lang.String message)
        Sends a command with the message provided through the output stream.
        Parameters:
        command - command to send.
        message - message to send.
        Returns:
        true if everything goes smoothly, false if else.

      • sendMessage

        public boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String channel,
                           java.lang.String message)
        Sends a message to a channel. Converts the String to bytes and sends them through the output stream.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel to send the message on.
        message - the message to send.
        Returns:
        true if everything goes well, false if else.

      • sendWhisper

        public boolean sendWhisper(java.lang.String channel,
                           java.lang.String user,
                           java.lang.String message)
        Sends a whisper to a user. Adds the user and message to two array lists, and the whisperThrottler thread handles the actual sending of the messages, since they need to be throttled.
        Parameters:
        user - user to send the whisper to.
        message - message to send.
        Returns:
        true always (used to have the possibility to send false, but because it no longer handles the actual sending, it can't know if there was an issue)

      • sendWhisper

        public boolean sendWhisper(User user,
                           java.lang.String message)
        Sends a whisper to a user. Adds the user and message to two array lists, and the whisperThrottler thread handles the actual sending of the messages, since they need to be throttled.
        Parameters:
        user - user to send the whisper to.
        message - message to send.
        Returns:
        true always (used to have the possibility to send false, but because it no longer handles the actual sending, it can't know if there was an issue)

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overriden toString method.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Thread
